title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.16 - Religious services and counseling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.16 - Religious services and counseling

State Regulations

If provided, religious services and counseling must be
included in the registrant's personcentered care plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
425.16

Amended by

New

York State Register September 10, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 36, eff. 9/10/2014. Amended and Renumbered from 425.15

New

York State Register March 20, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
